title: Strengthening e-Learning Practical Competencies: Self-Evaluation and Improvement Project for Enhancing Teacher Performance

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Teachers can quantitatively measure current performance using a self-diagnosis survey tool across four core domains: instructional design, process management, assessment, and material development
Learners can share performance analysis results and propose at least three customized improvement strategies through PBL activities with peer teachers
Over 80% of participants can submit actionable plans to overcome educational environment constraints by the end of the course
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
